title: Office Hours & Schedules
description: Understand common office hours and how to describe your working day.
objectives: Use 'from... to...' to describe a schedule

theorySlides.title: Typical Office Hours
theorySlides.content:
Most offices have standard working hours.

- **Full-time**: Usually 40 hours a week.
- **Part-time**: Fewer than 30-35 hours a week.
- **Shift work**: Different hours each day/week.

theorySlides.title: Describing Your Day
theorySlides.content:
Use 'from... to...' to talk about your hours:

- "I work **from** 9:00 AM **to** 5:00 PM."
- "Our office is open **from** Monday **to** Friday."

interactiveCheck.question: If you work from 8:00 to 12:00, how many hours do you work?
